Threat: Nature: Submarine cable gets damaged by tectonic plate shift
Countermeasure: Redundant infrastructure in CH and IS, both locations are close to multiple submarine cables

Threat: Employee: Configuration mistake leads to network outage
Countermeasure: Redundant infrastructure with automatic load balancing seamlessly switches to the other instance

Threat: Organized Crime, Skilled Hacker: DoS attack to throttle network connection
Countermeasure: Redundant infrastructure with load balancing is able to handle more traffic than a single one
Additional Countermeasures: Add an additional load balancer to remove the single point of failure that it currently is. Or outsource load balancing to a CDN (since it is not security critical) and benefit from their DoS protection.
